entities: United Nations Mission in Sierra Leone
summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling its resolutions 1270 (1999), 1289 (2000) and 1313 (2000) and all other relevant resolutions and statements of its President concerning Sierra Leone,
 Decides to extend the present mandate of the United Nations Mission in Sierra Leone until 20 September 2000;
 Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
